last_episode_to_air.name: A Very Villain Christmas
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Madden family celebrates their first Christmas in Valley View; while trying to score their most wanted gift, Amy and Jake learn the true meaning of Christmas.

name: The Villains of Valley View
overview: A family of raucous supervillains who recently ran afoul of the League of Villains and now must somehow beat a path to normalcy in a small Texas town.

episodes.name: Finding Another Dimension
episodes.overview: As our villain family learns how to blend into their new town, things get complicated with their neighbor, Hartley, when Amy and Jake get their hands on their dad’s evil invention.

episodes.name: Trust No One
episodes.overview: Fearing Hartley will reveal their true identity, the villainous family decides to blackmail her to keep their secret safe.

episodes.name: The Villain Experience
episodes.overview: Feeling bad that Colby has never had a chance to be a villain like they did, Amy and Jake set out to create a villain experience for him.

episodes.name: Belts, Bulls & Superfans
episodes.overview: When Eva turns Mother’s Day into a gift-giving challenge with consequences, Amy tries to score her the best gift ever but is forced to resort to more villainous tactics to win.

episodes.name: ColossaCon!
episodes.overview: When Amy finds out that her biggest nemesis, superhero Starling, is making an appearance at the upcoming superhero convention, she sets out to get revenge.

episodes.name: Super Secrets
episodes.overview: Jake and Hartley head off to confront Starling before she can rally the other superheroes to strike - all while keeping Amy and the rest of the villain family in the dark.

episodes.name: A Little Havoc
episodes.overview: When Amy agrees to help Hartley babysit a young neighbor girl, Scarlett, she learns that Scarlett is a huge fan of Havoc so she starts to "mentor" her herself.

episodes.name: The Two Jakes
episodes.overview: When Jake starts bonding with Celia's new boyfriend, Robert, a jealous Vic creates a villainous clone of Jake to recapture their good times together.

episodes.name: Battle for My Brother
episodes.overview: Amy feels betrayed when she discovers Jake is meeting up with Starling. While Vic is attempting to fix Colby, an accident causes Colby to shift into an old man.

episodes.name: Unleash the Chaos
episodes.overview: Colby finally shape-shifts back into his 13-year-old self, only to get caught in a shape-shifting loop that toggles between his young and old self.

episodes.name: Havoc-ween
episodes.overview: Amy brings her mischievous body-snatching Grandma to a party. Vic and Eva scam kids out of their candy untill they come across a villain even bigger than themselves.

episodes.name: Showdown at the Round Up
episodes.overview: When Hartley gets nervous about an audition, Amy decides to use her powers to help. The family is concerned that Celia's security cameras caught Colby using his new power.

episodes.name: Friend or Foe
episodes.overview: Amy sets out to prove that Hartley's new crush is a liar but keeps coming up empty. Vic schemes to use the family's powers to start their own pizza delivery business.

episodes.name: Vials and Tribulations
episodes.overview: When Amy and Hartley get detention, Amy goes to wipe the principal's memory but erases Vic's. Eva gets a job and attempts to keep Celia, a secret shopper, happy.

episodes.name: A Superhero in Valley View
episodes.overview: Starling returns to Valley View, revealing the superheroes accused her of helping the Maddens, and now she's on the run. Bad Jake returns and shrinks Vic and Eva.

episodes.name: We Don't Care
episodes.overview: After Amy and Hartley decide to use a villain song in a Battle of the Bands, Eva forbids them. When a delivery person drops off Celia's new recliners, Vic gives them an upgrade.

episodes.name: Bad Energy
episodes.overview: When Vic says he needs Flashform's helmet, Amy and Colby must scramble to get it back from Milo. When the lair causes a big electric bill, the family must cover to Celia.

episodes.name: No Escape
episodes.overview: It's Declan and Hartley's anniversary. To surprise Hartley, Declan arranges an escape room event, but when the family arrives, they begin to worry things aren't what they seem. / When the family gets shocking news, they embrace their villain side and go to Centropolis on a mission. Colby must get out of a sticky situation, and Hartley tries her best to help.

episodes.name: No Escape, Part 2
episodes.overview: When the family gets shocking news, they embrace their villain side and go to Centropolis on a mission. Colby must get out of a sticky situation, and Hartley tries her best to help.

episodes.name: How the Villains Stole Christmas
episodes.overview: Set in the past, Onyx issues an annual ruin-Christmas challenge, but the Maddens get more than they bargained for.

episodes.name: Villain Number One
episodes.overview: Amy hides her double life and a new villain infiltrates the family to get revenge on them; Hartley suspects something is off and races to save Amy, with some unlikely help.

episodes.name: Power Hungry
episodes.overview: Amy convinces Colby to let Hartley borrow his super-speed but has a hard time getting it back. Jake and Celia solve a true crime podcast cold case for the reward money.

episodes.name: Dojo Mojo
episodes.overview: Jake is tired of being the "nice guy," so he joins a karate class to restore his respect at school. Hartley and Colby want limited edition sneakers, but Vic and Eva scam them.

episodes.name: Overnight Success
episodes.overview: Amy and Hartley compete with Gem to gain more followers for their band. Colby is set up by a new student at school, so Eva helps him get even.

episodes.name: Party People
episodes.overview: Celia and Amy throw Hartley separate birthday parties, which she tries to attend simultaneously. Vic, Eva and Colby get trapped in the basement lair.

episodes.name: Vases, Volcanoes & the Green-Eyed Monster
episodes.overview: Amy is jealous of the time Eva and Hartley are spending together at their pottery class. Instead of being honest, Amy drags Celia along as her pottery partner to make Eva jealous.

episodes.name: Fired Up
episodes.overview: Jake is promoted to be Eva's boss at the Round-up. Colby gets a fever and his powers start glitching.

episodes.name: The Scare
episodes.overview: Amy, Hartley and Colby sneak into Gem's house to get rid of a video that will expose Amy's secret. Celia and Jake prank Vic and Eva, so they vow to exact revenge.

episodes.name: Family Secrets
episodes.overview: Hartley encourages Amy to learn more about her dad's family. When she does, it becomes clear Vic is hiding something. After some digging, Amy unearths a shocking family secret.

episodes.name: Power Struggle
episodes.overview: Amy, Jake and Colby set out to infiltrate Blue Granite's superhero dwelling. But when things go awry, everyone is in danger.

episodes.name: Hidden Hero
episodes.overview: Jake realizes he can use his power anonymously to help people in need, so he sets out to become an undercover hero; Vic challenges Celia to a pepper-eating contest.

episodes.name: The Promposal
episodes.overview: When teenage supervillain Havoc stands up to the head of the League of Villains, her family members are forced to change their identities and relocate to a sleepy Texas suburb.

episodes.name: The Haunted Jukebox
episodes.overview: When a haunted jukebox sends Amy and Hartley to an alternate dimension of Valley View, they must figure out how to get home before they are trapped in Monster Town forever.

episodes.name: Guitar Hero
episodes.overview: Jake reveals his secret talent is playing guitar, but Amy won't let him join her band. Eva, Vic and Colby try to babysit an infant and pet sit Robert's police dog at the same time.

episodes.name: Bad Influence
episodes.overview: Feeling overwhelmed by the pressures of being a superhero, Starling threatens to quit; Amy's helpful advice backfires.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Havocs
episodes.overview: Havoc and Flashform go to Centropolis to stop an imposter from stealing Havoc's identity. Eva and Vic manipulate Hartley's charity auction.

episodes.name: The Return
episodes.overview: When a supervillain threatens the Maddens, they join together to fight; an unlikely ally comes to their rescue.

episodes.name: A Very Villain Christmas
episodes.overview: The Madden family celebrates their first Christmas in Valley View; while trying to score their most wanted gift, Amy and Jake learn the true meaning of Christmas.
